front.title: The End to End Problem in a fully generalized IPv4, IPv6, and IPv4+IPv6 network

abstract.t: This note is intended to describe the end to end problem as it applies to a network of networks, wherein some component networks independently run only IPv4 with or without a transition mechanism, some run only IPv6 with or without a transition mechanism and without coordination of transition mechanisms, and some run IPv4 and IPv6 in parallel supporting native routing.
